# gutenbergr.data

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Frequently updated metadata about the Project Gutenberg collection <https://www.gutenberg.org/>.

## Installation

You can install the development version of gutenbergr.data from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jonthegeek/gutenbergr.data")
```
